component.name: OpenList
component.summary: A resilient, long-term governance, community-driven file management platform

description.p: OpenList is a powerful file management and sharing platform that provides a web-based interface for managing files and directories. It supports multiple storage backends and offers features like file sharing, user management, and more.
OpenList is a resilient, long-term governance, community-driven fork of AList â€” built to defend open source against trust-based attacks.

ul.li: Multiple storage backends (Local, Aliyundrive, OneDrive, GoogleDrive, S3, WebDAV, and many more)
File preview (PDF, markdown, code, plain text)
Video and audio preview with lyrics and subtitles support
Protected routes with password protection and authentication
File upload, delete, mkdir, rename, move and copy operations
Copy files between different storage systems
